title: Fresh pasta with griddled asparagus and a lemon and breadcrumb topping
description: Griddling asparagus is a simple way to make this spring vegetable shine. Here it serves as a fresh-tasting accompaniment to pasta with a lemon and herb crunch.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need a pasta machine fitted with the pasta cutter of your choice.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 4oz fine semolina flour, plus extra for dusting
2 tbsp finely chopped fresh flatleaf parsley
